con:interface.name: Marketplace API

con:method.name: MarketPlaceSellerOrder.get
con:method.con:description: Retrieve Seller Orders Get Seller Orders

con:parameter.con:name: late_orders
con:parameter.con:description: Whether to filter for only orders that are late. Either 0 or 1.

con:parameter.con:name: leadtime_stock_delivery_date
con:parameter.con:description: Whether to return the LSDD for display. Either 0 or 1.

con:parameter.con:name: page_size
con:parameter.con:description: Page size - max number of results to return (i.e. LIMIT in SQL)

con:parameter.con:name: page_number
con:parameter.con:description: Which page of results to start at

con:parameter.con:name: paginate
con:parameter.con:description: Whether to paginate results. Either 0 or 1.

con:parameter.con:name: prefix
con:parameter.con:description: One of 'all_', 'awaiting_stock_' or 'late_orders_'. Used for variable naming of results.

con:method.name: MarketPlaceCatalogRules.Get
con:method.con:description: Get the marketplace catalog rules for products, categories and departments Get the marketplace catalog rules for products, categories and departments

con:method.name: MarketPlaceCatalogRules.Post
con:method.con:description: Create a marketplace catalog rule for products, categories and departments Create a marketplace catalog rule for products, categories and departments

con:method.name: MarketPlaceSellerStatus.get
con:method.con:description: The different statuses a seller could have Get MP Seller Statuses

con:method.name: MarketPlaceSellerListings.get
con:method.con:description: Retrieve Seller Lstings bsaed on various criteria Get Seller Listings

con:parameter.con:name: seller_listings_by_tsin
con:parameter.con:description: Whether to search by TSIN. Either 0 or 1.

con:parameter.con:name: seller_listings_by_shipping_order
con:parameter.con:description: Whether to search by Shipping Order. Either 0 or 1.

con:parameter.con:name: seller_listings_by_shipment
con:parameter.con:description: Whether to search by Shipment. Either 0 or 1.

con:parameter.con:name: removal_order
con:parameter.con:description: Search in removal order shipments. Either 0 or 1.

con:parameter.con:name: basic_info_only
con:parameter.con:description: Retrieve basic information about listings only. Either 0 or 1.

con:method.name: MarketPlaceSellerListings.post
con:method.con:description: Add, Update, Delete, Archive, Increment, or Disable a Seller Listing Edit Seller Listings

con:method.name: MarketPlaceSellerReferenceType.get
con:method.con:description: The different charge types for seller accounting. E.g. 'Monthly', 'Invoice', 'Return' Get Seller Reference Types

con:parameter.con:name: page_size
con:parameter.con:description: Page size - max number of results to return (i.e. LIMIT in SQL)

con:parameter.con:name: page_number
con:parameter.con:description: Which page of results to start at

con:parameter.con:name: is_text_filter
con:parameter.con:description: True/False. Whether LIKE should be used in the SQL query.

con:method.name: MarketPlaceSellerReturnHistory.get
con:method.con:description: Get the different statuses a product return has been in since it was created Status history of a return

con:parameter.con:name: rrn
con:parameter.con:description: The RRN code of the return

con:parameter.con:name: paginate
con:parameter.con:description: Whether to paginate results. Either 0 or 1.

con:method.con:description: Retrieve a Seller's logo Retrieve a Seller's logo

con:method.con:description: Create or update a Seller's logo Modify a Seller's logo

con:method.name: MarketPlaceShipmentStatus.get
con:method.con:description: List of the statuses a shipment can be in. Statuses are for a shipment or removal order. Possible statuses of a shipment

con:method.con:description: Find Marketplace Shipments Find MP Shipments

con:method.name: MarketPlaceShipment.post
con:method.con:description: Add, Update, Delete Marketplace Shipments Work with Shipments

con:method.name: MarketplaceShippingOrder.get
con:method.con:description: Find Marketplace Shipping Order information Find Marketplace Shipping Orders

con:parameter.con:description: The value to filter the filter_field for

con:parameter.con:description: True/False. Whether like should be used in the SQL query.

con:parameter.con:description: 0/1. Whether to look for Removal Orders.

con:method.con:description: Add, Update, Delete or Close a Marketplace Shipping Order Update Marketplace Shipping Orders

con:testSuite.name: Marketplace_API_TestSuite
con:testSuite.con:description: TestSuite generated for REST Service [Marketplace API]

con:config.con:query: select seller_listings.idSeller,orderitems.idOrder,seller_listings.sku from take2.orderitems, take2.products,take2.seller_listings where orderitems.idProduct = products.idProduct and products.idProduct = seller_listings.idSellerListing and seller_listings.idSeller = 785657 Limit 1;

con:configuration.content: Account will be cancelled at the end of the subscription cycle
Account has been deleted by Takealot
[Account is Active, Account has been suspended by Takealot, Account has been cancelled by seller, Account has been deleted by Takealot, Account will be cancelled at the end of the subscription cycle]
Account has been cancelled by seller
Account has been suspended by Takealot

con:config.con:query: select idTsin,idSellerListing from take2.seller_listings where seller_listings.idSeller = 785657 and seller_listings.idTsin=36904926 limit 1;
